ResourcesPage.seo.title: Resource Center | HeyTCM
ResourcesPage.seo.description: HeyTCM Resource Center, offering abundant TCM intelligence-related materials and tools.
ResourcesPage.seo.og.title: Resource Center | HeyTCM
ResourcesPage.seo.og.description: HeyTCM Resource Center, offering abundant TCM intelligence-related materials and tools.
ResourcesPage.head.title: HeyTCM - Resource Center
ResourcesPage.banner.title: Health Wisdom Library
ResourcesPage.intro: Selected whitepapers, guides, and literature to help you deeply understand TCM and health. All resources are free for community members to download and use.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: Whitepaper on TCM Sleep Regulation
ResourcesPage.resources.description: In-depth analysis of TCM sleep concepts and regulation methods, exploring the relationship between organs and sleep, and the application of smart technology in sleep monitoring.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: Overview of Smart Ring Technology & Patents
ResourcesPage.resources.description: Detailed introduction to HeyTCM smart ring core technology, sensor principles, data acquisition and processing, and related patent landscape.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: TCM Self-care Guide for Common Digestive Issues
ResourcesPage.resources.description: For common modern digestive problems, provides TCM syndrome differentiation and self-care methods including acupressure and dietary advice.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: Seasonal Wellness Calendar Template
ResourcesPage.resources.description: Annual wellness plan based on TCM 24 solar terms, helping users scientifically arrange diet and daily life in line with natural rhythms.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: Detailed Analysis of Classic TCM Formula: Siwu Decoction Series
ResourcesPage.resources.description: Systematic analysis of Siwu Decoction and its variations: composition, efficacy, application, modern research progress, and pharmacological explanations.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: TCM Constitution Self-assessment Questionnaire
ResourcesPage.resources.description: Standardized questionnaire for nine TCM constitution types, helping users preliminarily identify their type for personalized regulation.

ResourcesPage.emptyState.title: No relevant resources found
ResourcesPage.emptyState.description: Try selecting another category or check back later.
ResourcesPage.requestResources.title: Can't find the resource you need?
ResourcesPage.requestResources.descripti: If you wish us to provide resources on specific topics or have any suggestions, let us know. We'll do our best to meet community needs.
